name: Winter Sports Games
overview: Off to the snow! It does not matter if you prefer to ski, bobsleigh or sled down the ice rink, or relax curling the stones over the ice when curling - there is certainly something for everyone here. There are six exciting disciplines to win tournaments and master challenges. You can play alone or with up to four players on the sofa - and all without a runny nose after the competition! Features • 6 exciting disciplines: • Ski jumping • Ski slalom • Ski downhill • Bobsledding • sledging • curling • Local multiplayer for 2 to 4 players • modern graphics and classic controls
